column1: #text=That is why yesterday , I took it upon myself to bake the most delicious chocolate cherry cake the world has ever seen or tasted .

#text=So , first I went to the grocery store in the next town to get the necessary ingredients : flour , sugar , baking powder , yeast , artificial colors , butter , fake cherries , eggs and chocolate .
#text=Then , I drove my car home and spread out all the ingredients on the kitchen table .
#text=I pulled out my baking book and found the recipe to the cake I wanted to cook .
#text=I mixed the dry ingredients in one bowl and set them aside .
#text=Then , I took all the eggs and liquid ingredients and blended them in another bowl .
#text=Then I took both bowls and blended the ingredients .
#text=Then I preheated the oven to 350 degrees , and put the mixture in a glass pan with a buttered bottom .
